hero.badge: Inspiring growth, resilience, and renewed purpose.
hero.description: At <brand>change180</brand>, we help individuals and families experience meaningful, faith-rooted transformation by addressing emotional wellness, purpose, and personal growth.
hero.trustIndicator: You don't need to have it all figured out — you just need a willingness to take the next step.

about.headline: Hi, I'm Myra Z. Guzman, M.Ed.
about.paragraph1: I am a bilingual certified life coach and educator with a deep passion for helping others live fulfilling and faith-centered lives.
about.paragraph2: With over 17 years of experience supporting children, families, and adults through education, emotional development, and community-based services, I bring a unique blend of knowledge, empathy, and spiritual guidance to my coaching practice.
about.paragraph3: I created <brand>change180</brand> to serve those who want real change without judgment, faith without shame, and growth that feels both grounded and hopeful.
about.disclaimer: Coaching services are non-clinical and educational in nature and do not replace therapy.
about.imageAlt: Myra Z. Guzman, M.Ed. - Life Coach

whoWeHelp.headline: <brand>change180</brand> Is For You
whoWeHelp.description: If you're ready to stop surviving and start moving forward — <brand>change180</brand> was created for you.

individuals.title: Individuals
individuals.description: Seeking clarity, direction, and personal growth in life's journey.

parents.title: Parents
parents.description: Supporting and understanding their children's emotional and mental wellness.

families.title: Families
families.description: Navigating stress, transitions, or conflict with grace and unity.

women.title: Women
women.description: Feeling overwhelmed, burned out, or disconnected from purpose.

faithCentered.title: Faith-Centered Clients
faithCentered.description: Wanting emotional growth aligned with their values and beliefs.

whoWeHelp.whyDescription: A 180-degree change means turning completely around — choosing a new direction. We help you pause, reflect, and intentionally move toward the life God is calling you to live.
beliefs: Growth is possible at any stage of life
Healing and faith can walk together
Small steps lead to lasting transformation
You are not broken — you are becoming

services.headline: Coaching Services Offered
services.description: Faith-centered, culturally responsive, and trauma-informed support designed for real life — not perfection.

individual.title: Individual Life Coaching
individual.description: Personalized 1:1 sessions focused on life transitions, purpose, emotional wellness, and faith-centered decision-making.

family.title: Parent & Family Coaching
family.description: Support for parents and families seeking tools, communication strategies, and faith-based guidance.
features: Tools to support children's emotional health

group.title: Group Programs & Workshops
group.description: Community-based learning for churches, schools, nonprofits, and organizations.

digital.title: Digital Resources
digital.description: Coming soon — tools and resources to support your growth journey at your own pace.

services.imageAlt: Myra coaching a client in her office

packages.headline: Investment in Your Growth
packages.description: Faith-centered guidance for real-life transformation. Choose the package that fits your journey.

discovery.name: Discovery Session
discovery.description: Explore whether coaching is right for you. Identify challenges and create a faith-aligned plan.

clarity.name: Clarity Package
clarity.description: Focused support for those feeling stuck, overwhelmed, or uncertain about their path.

rooted.name: Rooted & Renewed
rooted.description: Deeper coaching addressing patterns, habits, and mindset through a faith-centered lens.

flourish.name: Flourish Forward
flourish.description: Premium program for individuals and families committed to purposeful, lasting change.

familyCoaching.title: Family & Parent Coaching
familyCoaching.description: 60-minute focused session for parents seeking guidance, tools, and support.

testimonials.headline: Stories of Transformation
testimonials.description: Hear from those who have experienced the power of faith-centered coaching.

quotes.quote: Working with Myra has been transformative. I've gained clarity, confidence, and a stronger connection to my faith.
quotes.author: Jane

quotes.quote: Myra's guidance has helped our family communicate better and overcome challenging situations with grace.
quotes.author: Maria

contact.headline: Ready to Begin Your Transformation?
contact.description: Take the first step toward clarity, growth, and purpose. Reach out today to schedule your Discovery Session or ask any questions.

organizations.description: Group rates, church partnerships, and custom workshops available.

footer.tagline: Guiding faith, family, and personal growth. Transform your life with faith-centered coaching.
footer.disclaimer: <brand>change180</brand> provides coaching, education, and consulting services. Coaching is not therapy and does not replace mental health treatment. No diagnosis or clinical services are provided through coaching.
